name: Beyond TV Transport Stream File
summary: Learn about .TP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open and view .TP files with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TP files capture data from a transport stream (TS), which is a communications protocol for transmitting audio and video data. It includes error correction that allows the stream to remain intact even if some data from the transmission is not received.
NOTE: TP files that contain hours of high-definition content may be several gigabytes in size.

description: Video recording captured using Beyond TV digital video recording software; recorded using a compatible TV tuner card and a television source such as analog or digital cable, satellite, or antenna.
